name: initialize_campaign
attributes: # [doc = " 新しいキャンペーンを初期化（管理者が署名）"]
body: let camp = & mut ctx . accounts . campaign ;
camp . organizer = ctx . accounts . organizer . key () ;
camp . goal = goal ;
camp . raised = 0 ;
msg ! ("Campaign initialized by {}, goal = {}" , camp . organizer , camp . goal) ;

name: contribute
attributes: # [doc = " 支援 (誰でも可／署名必須)"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . contributor . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
* * ctx . accounts . contributor . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? -= amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += amount ;
let camp = & mut ctx . accounts . campaign ;
camp . raised = camp . raised . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("{} contributed {} lamports (total raised = {})" , ctx . accounts . contributor . key () , amount , camp . raised) ;

name: withdraw_funds
attributes: # [doc = " 目標達成後に資金を引き出し（主催者のみ）"]
body: require ! (ctx . accounts . organizer . is_signer , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;
let camp_balance = * * ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow () ;
require ! (camp_balance >= ctx . accounts . campaign . goal , ErrorCode :: GoalNotReached) ;
* * ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? -= camp_balance ;
* * ctx . accounts . organizer . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += camp_balance ;
msg ! ("Organizer {} withdrew {} lamports" , ctx . accounts . organizer . key () , camp_balance) ;

fields.name: campaign
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = organizer , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"camp" , organizer . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"vault" , campaign . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , init_if_needed , payer = contributor , space = 8)]

fields.name: campaign
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"camp" , organizer . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , has_one = organizer)]
